name: 劉明傑
objective:
人工智慧與程式設計之基礎觀念介紹及應用。主要內容包括：1. 程式語言與程式設計、2. 數據科學、3. 人工智慧與機器學習、4. 影像辨識與物件偵測
This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of artificial intelligence and program design, including, 1. Programming Languages and Programming, 2. Data Science, 3. Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, 4. Image Recognition and Object Detection.
schedule:
Week 1 - C
Week 2 - Arrays
Week 3 - FPGA & Algorithms
Week 4 - Memory
Week 5 - Data Structures
Week 6 - HTTP
Week 7 - Python
Week 8 - Artificial Intelligence 
Week 9 - Machine Learning
Week 10 - Python
Week 11 - SQL
Week 12 – 15 Image Recognition and Object Detection
Week 16 – 18 : Group oral presentation
scorePolicy:
Homework: 30%
Mid-term assignment: 30%
Group oral presentation: 40%
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG5：性別平等（Gender Equality）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）
課程是否導入AI: AI1：使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）AI2：鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）AI3：使用生成式 AI 進行課堂即時互動（Use generative AI for real-time classroom interaction）AI4：簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）AI5：深入探討 AI 的原理與應用（Explore the principles and applications of AI in depth）
